sentences.sContent: Her humor is good, so the meal that she does is natural also more goluptious .
sentences.sContent_eng: Her humor is good, so the meal that she does is natural also more goluptious .
sentences.sCn: 她的心情好了，那么她做出来的饭菜也自然就更加可口了。

sentences.sContent: In Hangzhou a cafeteria has a meal recently, dish is goluptious besides, rice also arouses my interest.
sentences.sContent_eng: In Hangzhou a cafeteria has a meal recently, dish is goluptious besides, rice also arouses my interest.
sentences.sCn: 最近在杭州一家餐馆吃饭，菜肴可口之外，米饭也引起我的爱好。

synos.tran: 可口的；香喷喷的；好吃的

trans.tranCn: 可口的, 香喷喷的, 好吃的
